【考法 2】adj. 有感染力的：exciting a similar feeling or reaction in others
【例】 The en-thusi-asm[ɪn'θuzɪæzəm] of the new club members was contagious. 新成员的热情具有很强的感染力
【近】 catching, epidemic, spreading
